title: Elementary Science Teacher Professional Development Program Through Collaborative Discourse

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching foundational science subjects and operating PBL (Project-Based Learning) classes
context.additional_context: Teachers collaborate using tools like Google Workspace and Padlet in a BYOD environment to complete team-based science education design projects. Summative assessments are conducted through final deliverables and presentations

learning_goals: Participating teachers enhance their science PBL lesson design capabilities through collaborative discourse.
Teachers apply the ADDIE model-based instructional design process to develop innovative science lessons.
Participants apply eight facilitator roles (coordinator, mediator, spokesperson, etc.) in real-world contexts through collaboration with academic developers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
